body: Circle's failure relates to security issues with some packages required through a `photon-ant` dependency. I will have to resolve that within the `photon-ant` package itself, however this PR is still good for review.
body_text: Circle's failure relates to security issues with some packages required through a photon-ant dependency. I will have to resolve that within the photon-ant package itself, however this PR is still good for review.
